f4e3e9ee-b2d9-4464-9d18-fe221934660c.name: Weapon Bond (Starting Shield)
f4e3e9ee-b2d9-4464-9d18-fe221934660c.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

5772fad3-49dd-48a3-aea1-85b1afdb961a.name: A further 60 points chosen from among:

3e8a3aa8-e825-4d33-87ed-7fa6328ad49e.name: Unfazeable
3e8a3aa8-e825-4d33-87ed-7fa6328ad49e.notes: Exempt from fright checks. Reaction modifiers do not affect you.

features.situation: on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun
to initiative rolls for your side (+2 if you are the leader)

56394a59-9004-4b70-84e6-ff90efeba5df.name: Fit
56394a59-9004-4b70-84e6-ff90efeba5df.notes: Recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

995700ef-dbb0-4a12-9375-e8b1f3841244.name: Very Fit
995700ef-dbb0-4a12-9375-e8b1f3841244.notes: Recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

features.situation: to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison

to HT rolls made for survival at -HP or below, and on any HT roll where failure means instant death. If this bonus makes the difference between success and failure, you collapse, apparently dead (or disabled), but come to in the usual amount of time. A successful Diagnosis roll reveals the truth.
to any HT roll to avoid unconsciousness

7fa335db-4967-4410-a597-4a3f2964dac1.name: High Pain Threshold
7fa335db-4967-4410-a597-4a3f2964dac1.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured

features.situation: on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning
to resist torture

06044701-1d1b-4668-8092-bcfdbcf5d42c.name: Luck
06044701-1d1b-4668-8092-bcfdbcf5d42c.notes: Usable once per hour of play

c70247bd-b340-4071-bd0b-5313f30bc067.name: Extraordinary Luck
c70247bd-b340-4071-bd0b-5313f30bc067.notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play

18bc6ab0-4b35-4be2-b6dd-ac9c99f5df8a.name: Easy to Hit
18bc6ab0-4b35-4be2-b6dd-ac9c99f5df8a.notes: Others can target your eyes at only -6 to hit

features.situation: to your effective HT whenever you roll to recover lost HP or to see if you can get over a crippling injury

e9c781cf-04b5-4566-a9d7-5c1a36e5349b.name: Recovery
e9c781cf-04b5-4566-a9d7-5c1a36e5349b.notes: When determining the length of time you remain unconscious for any reason, divide all times by 60

91676876-169d-47da-95fa-2bc755ec9ee1.name: Signature Gear
91676876-169d-47da-95fa-2bc755ec9ee1.notes: For equipment normally bought with money, each point gives goods worth up to 50% of the average campaign starting wealth (but never cash).

220051aa-e94b-489b-9001-38bc6d9c3713.name: Weapon Bond (A second shield)
220051aa-e94b-489b-9001-38bc6d9c3713.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

7715540d-6cbd-43ef-8e26-bf9f7c12c092.name: Vow
7715540d-6cbd-43ef-8e26-bf9f7c12c092.notes: Always fight with at least one shield in hand

f97629f0-f3df-47e4-bfdf-1e3f9cce04ec.name: -25 points chosen from among these traits:

a757668a-b279-43d0-8b80-173078ca39cb.name: Bloodlust
a757668a-b279-43d0-8b80-173078ca39cb.notes: You must make a self-control roll whenever you need to accept a surrender, evade a sentry, take a prisoner, etc.

features.situation: to others
to IQ-based skills when alone

82d2f310-39a4-45da-ab31-3c1403c9153d.name: Code of Honor (Chivalry)
82d2f310-39a4-45da-ab31-3c1403c9153d.notes: Protect any lady, and anyone weaker than yourself. Never break your word. Never ignore an insult to yourself, a lady, your liege-lord, or your faith; insults may only be wiped out by an apology or a duel (not necessarily to the death!). Never take advantage of an opponent in any way; weapons and circumstances must be equal (even in open war if the foe is also noble and chivalrous). Accept any challenge to arms from anyone of greater or equal rank.

901c54d6-9236-4ef2-b4ee-8261744aa9d1.name: Code of Honor (Soldier's)
901c54d6-9236-4ef2-b4ee-8261744aa9d1.notes: An officer should be tough but fair, lead from the front, and look out for his men; an enlisted man should look out for his buddies and take care of his kit. Every soldier should be willing to fight and die for the honor of his unit, service, and country; follow orders; obey the “rules of war”; treat an honorable enemy with respect (a dishonorable enemy deserves a bullet); and wear the uniform with pride.

features.situation: from like-minded extroverts
or worse from sober-minded citizens (GM discretion)

203ee659-5165-4877-b0c2-ee008c4dec0b.name: Greed
203ee659-5165-4877-b0c2-ee008c4dec0b.notes: Make a self-control roll any time riches are offered – as payment for fair work, gains from adventure, spoils of crime, or just bait. If you fail, you do whatever it takes to get the payoff.

features.situation: to others
to IQ-based skills when alone, or only -1 if in a group of 4 or less

f67dfa0d-f69c-4b27-a8c7-5060a2336e74.name: Honesty
f67dfa0d-f69c-4b27-a8c7-5060a2336e74.notes: Make a self-control roll when faced with the “need” to break unreasonable laws; if you fail, you must obey the law, whatever the consequences. If you manage to resist your urges and break the law, make a second self-control roll afterward. If you fail, you must turn yourself in to the authorities!

ec306159-86ce-4583-8121-ac9784847f5b.name: Impulsiveness
ec306159-86ce-4583-8121-ac9784847f5b.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

ddbb6870-cffa-416e-9537-8a5d622c3226.name: Obsession
ddbb6870-cffa-416e-9537-8a5d622c3226.notes: Finding a fabled shield; Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to deviate from your goal. If you fail, you continue to pursue your Obsession, regardless of the consequences.

b709ada3-2f48-435f-be05-d8abc26f1eab.name: Selfless
b709ada3-2f48-435f-be05-d8abc26f1eab.notes: You must make a self-control roll to put your needs – even survival – before those of someone else.

features.situation: from others

4da3d9db-f7ce-4fb0-a608-b467e7119036.name: One of these melee weapon skills
